channel.title: Emote Teleports Help
channel.description:
I need to know how to add teleports into the emote tab, Where Player Controls, Auto Retaliate EtcEtc are.
Help, please.

item.title: Emote Teleports Help
item.dc:creator: @Tha_Hartpaint_Dude Tha Hartpaint Dude
item.description:
@Tha_Hartpaint_Dude wrote:

Hi there!

I see you have a problem! I gonna try to fix this! me Example to fix this problem is the teleport to “jad”.

  1. Open your client.java .

search for:

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("

Then add somewhere under that this:

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("jad")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by Musicmad441 } else { teleportToX = 2438; teleportToY = 5170; heightLevel = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; sendMessage("Write something here."); }

Now whe added a teleport. if whe don’t have a teleport to somewhere you can add something to your emote tab.

  1. adding teleport as a command.

Search in you Client.java for

customCommand("

Paste this under the code above.

customCommand("jad"); } break; case 162: if(teleblock == true){ sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); }

So now we have a Teleport that can be used as a command.

3.Adding your teleport to the emote tab.

Now u open your TextHandler.java and search for;

p.sendFrame126("

And now paste somewhere in that cases where u the teleport want.

Maybe this don’t work but whe just try to help you.

Cheerz,
The hartpaint team

Read full topic
